changelogversion.changelogtext: [b][u]Refined the database query logic and the program framework[/u][/b]
[b]New! [/b]Automatically get preview image, content and title from note content
[b]New! [/b]Refine the logic of adding labels to note
Fixed the crash of drawable incompatible in some devices
Fixed the crash when confirm table input
Fixed the recreation when the screen orientation changed
Allow user add text and picture to dashboard
Modified the Markdown code font style
